sentences.english: HP completes its merger transaction with Compaq Computer Corp.
sentences.chinese: 惠普公司完成了其與康柏電腦公司的合併。

sentences.english: Since then, HP's stock has jumped 22% to $28.
sentences.chinese: 此後，惠普的股價已升至28美元，上漲了22%。

sentences.english: And if you want to see the latest HP Deigns visit their site.
sentences.chinese: 如果你想看最新的惠普設計就訪問他們的網站。

sentences.english: However, some masteries like Sentinel provides HP or Shaman provides intelligence.
sentences.chinese: 然而，像哨兵提供惠普或薩滿一些掌握度提供情報。

sentences.english: Neither Apple nor Mr. Jobs have confirmed he had the Whipple procedure.
sentences.chinese: 蘋果公司和喬布斯均未證實他做過惠普爾手術。

sentences.english: Not that H-P has done badly in the business.
sentences.chinese: 並非惠普的個人電腦業務做的不好。

sentences.english: H-P is the top seller of personal computers and printers.
sentences.chinese: 惠普是全球最大的個人電腦和打印機銷售商。

sentences.english: Think of it as the connective tissue for HP's cloud.
sentences.chinese: 它就好比惠普雲中的結締組織。

sentences.english: Apotheker promised that the HP cloud would truly be open.
sentences.chinese: 李艾科承諾，惠普雲將真正做到開放。

sentences.english: HP had been a prime candidate for a shareholder nominations proposal next year.
sentences.chinese: 惠普一直是明年股東提名建議的主要候選公司。

sentences.english: The move would allow them to focus on the higher-margin software business.
sentences.chinese: 惠普將會把更多的目光轉向高利潤的軟件行業。

sentences.english: Now if only Mr. Whipple were around to give away the bride.
sentences.chinese: 現在，只要惠普爾先生要捐獻這套禮服的話。

sentences.english: HP and Lenovo, Dell's arch rivals, are doing the same.
sentences.chinese: 戴爾公司的主要競爭者惠普與聯想也都是這麼做的。

sentences.english: He skint his words once yet again.
sentences.chinese: 惠普又一次違反了諾言。

sentences.english: Yeah, so, first of all, it was interesting, you throwback to HP.
sentences.chinese: 你回首了惠普的往事，讓我深有感觸。

sentences.english: The world zigs left, company strategy zigs along with the trend.
sentences.chinese: 世界在向左轉，惠普的戰略也隨着這一趨勢而轉向。
